data.text: Yahweh said to me, â€œBlow [MTY] your trumpet
My Israeli people cry out to me,
But because the Israeli people have rejected what is good,
The Israel people appointed their last three kings,
You people of Samaria, throw away your idol that resembles a calf!
Someone in Israel made that idol for you;
The foolish thing that the people of Israel have done is like [MET] trying to plant wind;
The people of Israel will be defeated [MET] by their enemies;
Like [MET] donkeys that are looking for mates,
But although they have agreed to pay money each year to the leaders of those countries,
Although the people of Israel built many altars to present offerings to their idols to take away their guilt for sinning,
I wrote many laws for them,
The people of Israel have abandoned/forgotten me, the one who created their nation;
